Uses of Package
pitt.search.semanticvectors

  • Packages that use pitt.search.semanticvectors 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.experiments  
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography
    Package for orthographic representation, i.e., making vectors based on the characters that occur in a string.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.tables
    Package for creating semantic vectors from tabular data.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.utils
    Package containing various utility functions.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.viz
    Contains various classes for plotting results in two dimensions.
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors 
    Class and Description
    CloseableVectorStore
    Some vector stores (e.g., those that read from the filesystem) claim resources that aren't automatically garbage collected or released.
    ClusterResults.Clusters
    Thin struct for storing cluster information.
    CompoundVectorBuilder.VectorLookupSyntax 
    DocVectors.DocIndexingStrategy
    Enumeration of different memory management strategies for indexing documents.
    ElementalVectorStore.ElementalGenerationMethod 
    FlagConfig
    Class for representing and parsing command line flags into a configuration instance to be passed to other components.
    LuceneUtils
    Class to support reading extra information from Lucene indexes, including term frequency, doc frequency.
    LuceneUtils.TermWeight
    Determines which term-weighting strategy to use in indexing, and in search if FlagConfig.usetermweightsinsearch() is set.
    ObjectVector
    This class provides a basic object (e.g., term or document id) and corresponding vector.
    Search.SearchType
    Different types of searches that can be performed, set using FlagConfig.searchtype().
    SearchBatch.SearchType
    Different types of searches that can be performed, set using FlagConfig.searchtype().
    SearchResult
    Class to represent search results.
    TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod
    Different methods for creating positional indexes.
    TermVectorsFromLucene
    Implementation of vector store that creates term vectors by iterating through all the terms in a Lucene index.
    VectorSearcher
    Class for searching vector stores using different scoring functions.
    VectorStore
    Classes implementing this interface are used to represent a collection of object vectors, including i.
    VectorStoreRAM
    This class provides methods for reading a VectorStore into memory as an optimization if batching many searches.
    VectorStoreUtils.VectorStoreFormat 
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.experiments 
    Class and Description
    FlagConfig
    Class for representing and parsing command line flags into a configuration instance to be passed to other components.
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography
